pages.title: 緣翹陸龜
pages.text: The marginated tortoise ($(o)Testudo marginata$()) is a species of tortoise in the family Testudinidae.$(br2)The species is endemic to Greece, Italy, and the Balkans in Southern Europe.$(br2)It is the largest European tortoise.$(br2)The marginated tortoise is herbivorous, and hibernates for the winter.
